argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | psgnfitr.g | |- G = ( SymGrp ` N ) |
| 2 |  | psgnfitr.p | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 3 |  | psgnfitr.t | |- T = ran ( pmTrsp ` N ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mrCls ` ( SubMnd ` G ) ) = ( mrCls ` ( SubMnd ` G ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 1, 2, 4 | #P_symggen2 | |- ( N e. Fin -> ( ( mrCls ` ( SubMnd ` G ) ) ` T ) = B ) |
| 6 | 1 | #P_symggrp | |- ( N e. Fin -> G e. Grp ) |
| 7 |  | #P_grpmnd | |- ( G e. Grp -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( N e. Fin -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` G ) |
| 10 | 3, 1, 9 | #P_symgtrf | |- T C_ ( Base ` G ) |
| 11 | 9, 4 | #P_gsumwspan | |- ( ( G e. Mnd /\ T C_ ( Base ` G ) ) -> ( ( mrCls ` ( SubMnd ` G ) ) ` T ) = ran ( w e. Word T |-> ( G gsum w ) ) ) |
| 12 | 8, 10, 11 | #P_sylancl | |- ( N e. Fin -> ( ( mrCls ` ( SubMnd ` G ) ) ` T ) = ran ( w e. Word T |-> ( G gsum w ) ) ) |
| 13 | 5, 12 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( N e. Fin -> B = ran ( w e. Word T |-> ( G gsum w ) ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( N e. Fin -> ( Q e. B <-> Q e. ran ( w e. Word T |-> ( G gsum w ) ) ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( w e. Word T |-> ( G gsum w ) ) = ( w e. Word T |-> ( G gsum w ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( G gsum w ) e. _V |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_elrnmpti | |- ( Q e. ran ( w e. Word T |-> ( G gsum w ) ) <-> E. w e. Word T Q = ( G gsum w ) ) |
| 18 | 14, 17 | #P_syl6bb | |- ( N e. Fin -> ( Q e. B <-> E. w e. Word T Q = ( G gsum w ) ) ) |
